title: New: Lupa – Starved
content:
Fifteen year old wunderkid Lupa aka Imogen Jones kicked up quite a fuss a month or so back, with the emergence of her two debut tracks, The Creature and The Infinite Colour.

Now, with a whole lot of blog buzz behind her, she’s unleashed her next offering, the intimate, vocal led Starved. Less immediate than The Creature, and verging away from the Grimes comparisons that ravaged her debut track, Starved builds far more of a dreamy sound of her own. Check out Starved below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
